attributes.action: stop education authorities dictating to parents when they can take their annual holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If taking school holidays in term time most parents would be responsible & only take 2 wks max at a time when their childs education would be least disrupted. My childs class goes for a wk in the IOW this year in school time, where's the difference ?
